description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、律师，台湾民主运动的重要人物，曾任民主进步党主席。因美丽岛事件入狱，期间发生林宅血案。出狱后长期投身于社会运动，特别是反核四与公民投票相关议题。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, lawyer, and a key figure in Taiwan's democracy movement. He previously served as the chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party. He was imprisoned after the Kaohsiung Incident, during which his family was tragically murdered in the Lin family massacre. After his release, he has long been devoted to social movements, particularly opposing the fourth nuclear power plant and promoting referendum rights.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的妻子，曾在林义雄入狱后当选立法委员。
description.en: Wife of Lin Yi-hsiung, who was elected as a legislator after his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的长女，林宅血案的唯一幸存者。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Lin Yi-hsiung and the sole survivor of the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的双胞胎女儿之一，于林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: One of Lin Yi-hsiung's twin daughters, murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的双胞胎女儿之一，于林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: One of Lin Yi-hsiung's twin daughters, murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的母亲，于林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: Mother of Lin Yi-hsiung, murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 1979年在台湾高雄市发生的一场重大警民冲突事件，事件后台湾当局对党外运动人士进行大规模逮捕与审判，对台湾后续的民主发展影响深远。
description.en: A major police-civilian conflict that occurred in Kaohsiung, Taiwan in 1979. Following the incident, Taiwanese authorities conducted mass arrests and trials of Dangwai movement activists, profoundly impacting Taiwan's subsequent democratic development.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1980年2月28日，是针对当时因美丽岛事件而被羁押的林义雄家人的血腥谋杀案。林义雄的母亲及一对7岁的双胞胎女儿在家中被刺杀身亡，9岁长女林奂均受重伤，至今仍是悬案。
description.en: A brutal murder case that occurred on February 28, 1980, targeting the family of Lin Yi-hsiung, who was detained at the time for the Kaohsiung Incident. Lin's mother and his 7-year-old twin daughters were stabbed to death at home, while his 9-year-old eldest daughter, Lin Huan-chun, was severely injured. The case remains unsolved.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，由党外运动人士于1986年创立。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, founded in 1986 by figures from the Dangwai movement.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，是首位民主进步党籍总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China, and was the first president from the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄为呼吁马英九政府停止兴建龙门核能发电厂而发起的无限期绝食抗议行动。
description.en: An indefinite hunger strike initiated by Lin Yi-hsiung to call on the Ma Ying-jeou administration to halt the construction of the Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant.

description.zh-cn: 指马英九在2008年至2016年担任中华民国总统期间的行政团队。
description.en: Refers to the administrative team during Ma Ying-jeou's presidency of the Republic of China from 2008 to 2016.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市贡寮区的核能发电厂，其兴建与否引发了长期的政治与社会争议。
description.en: A nuclear power plant located in Gongliao District, New Taipei City, Taiwan. Its construction has been the subject of long-term political and social controversy.

description.zh-cn: 在1980年代民主进步党成立前，台湾党外人士争取民主的政治运动，旨在挑战中国国民党的一党专政。
description.en: A political movement in Taiwan before the establishment of the DPP in the 1980s, led by non-Kuomintang figures aiming to challenge the KMT's one-party rule and advocate for democracy.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，党外运动及民主进步党的重要人物，曾任民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, a key figure in the Dangwai movement and the Democratic Progressive Party, and a former chairman of the DPP.

description.zh-cn: 由林义雄与方素敏于1991年创办的非营利组织，旨在培养社会及政治改革运动人才。
description.en: A non-profit organization founded by Lin Yi-hsiung and Fang Su-min in 1991, dedicated to cultivating talent for social and political reform movements.

description.zh-cn: 由林义雄等人于1994年创立的社会运动团体，主张通过公民投票决定龙门核能发电厂（核四）的兴建与否。
description.en: A social movement group founded in 1994 by Lin Yi-hsiung and others, advocating for the use of a referendum to decide the fate of the Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant (Nuclear Four).

description.zh-cn: 指陈水扁在2000年至2008年担任中华民国总统期间的行政团队。
description.en: Refers to the administrative team during Chen Shui-bian's presidency of the Republic of China from 2000 to 2008.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，在任内推动多项民主改革。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China, promoting numerous democratic reforms during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任行政院院长、民主进步党主席等职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who has served as Premier of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 日治台湾台北州罗东郡下辖的行政区，为现今宜兰县五结乡的前身，是林义雄的出生地。
description.en: An administrative division under Taihoku Prefecture's Rōdō District during Japanese rule in Taiwan, the predecessor of modern-day Wujie Township, Yilan County, and the birthplace of Lin Yi-hsiung.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的顶尖研究型大学，林义雄毕业于该校法律学系。
description.en: A top research university located in Taipei, Taiwan. Lin Yi-hsiung graduated from its Department of Law.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学，林义雄于此获得公共行政学硕士学位。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, where Lin Yi-hsiung obtained a Master of Public Administration.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄于1986年加入民主进步党，后因与执政的主流派理念不合，于2006年1月24日宣布退党。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung joined the Democratic Progressive Party in 1986 and later announced his withdrawal from the party on January 24, 2006, due to disagreements with the ruling faction's principles.

description.zh-cn: 担任民主进步党第八届党主席，是第一位由党员直接选举产生的党主席，任内推动陈水扁参选总统并成功实现台湾首次政党轮替。
description.en: Served as the 8th Chairman of the DPP, becoming the first chairman directly elected by party members. During his tenure, he promoted Chen Shui-bian's presidential candidacy, leading to Taiwan's first-ever peaceful transfer of power between political parties.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄在美丽岛事件后被捕，并于1980年4月被军事法庭判处12年有期徒刑。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung was arrested after the Kaohsiung Incident and sentenced to 12 years in prison by a military tribunal in April 1980.

description.zh-cn: 在林宅血案中遇害身亡。
description.en: Murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 在林宅血案中遇害身亡。
description.en: Murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 在林宅血案中遇害身亡。
description.en: Murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 在林宅血案中身受重伤，是该案的唯一幸存者。
description.en: Was severely injured in the Lin family massacre, becoming the sole survivor of the incident.

description.zh-cn: 与妻子方素敏共同创办慈林教育基金会。
description.en: Co-founded the Chilin Education Foundation with his wife Fang Su-min.

description.zh-cn: 与丈夫林义雄共同创办慈林教育基金会。
description.en: Co-founded the Chilin Education Foundation with her husband Lin Yi-hsiung.

description.zh-cn: 创立核四公投促进会并担任召集人，长期推动以公民投票方式决定龙门核能发电厂的存废。
description.en: Founded the Nuclear Four Referendum Promotion Association and served as its convener, long advocating for deciding the fate of the Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant via public referendum.

description.zh-cn: 在担任民进党主席期间，主导党内提名机制，强势推举当时颇具人气的陈水扁代表民进党参选2000年总统选举。
description.en: As DPP Chairman, he led the party's nomination process and strongly pushed for the then-popular Chen Shui-bian to represent the DPP in the 2000 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 因修宪议题与时任党主席的许信良产生严重分歧，曾公开批评并串联党内派系发起“罢免许主席”行动。
description.en: Had serious disagreements with then-DPP Chairman Hsu Hsin-liang over constitutional amendments, publicly criticizing him and uniting party factions to launch a 'Recall Chairman Hsu' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在2006年民进党主席补选中，公开反对游锡堃等高层参选，在游锡堃当选后，林义雄选择退出民进党。
description.en: In the 2006 DPP chairmanship by-election, he publicly opposed the candidacy of Yu Shyi-kun and other high-level officials. After Yu was elected, Lin Yi-hsiung chose to leave the DPP.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统李登辉发布特赦令，宣告因美丽岛事件入狱的林义雄等人罪刑无效。
description.en: Then-President Lee Teng-hui issued a presidential pardon, declaring the sentences of Lin Yi-hsiung and others imprisoned for the Kaohsiung Incident null and void.

description.zh-cn: 在宣布停建核四引发政治风暴后，陈水扁政府最终妥协，于2001年2月14日宣布恢复兴建龙门核能发电厂。
description.en: After announcing the halt of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant construction sparked a political firestorm, the Chen Shui-bian administration eventually compromised and announced the resumption of construction on February 14, 2001.

description.zh-cn: 为要求停建核四，发起无限期禁食行动。
description.en: Initiated an indefinite hunger strike to demand the cessation of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant construction.

description.zh-cn: 在林义雄禁食行动引发的社会压力下，马英九政府最终宣布核四一号机安检后封存、二号机停工。
description.en: Under public pressure sparked by Lin Yi-hsiung's hunger strike, the Ma Ying-jeou administration ultimately announced that Unit 1 of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant would be mothballed after safety checks and Unit 2 construction would be halted.

description.zh-cn: 此禁食行动最终迫使政府宣布核四一号机安检后封存、二号机停工。
description.en: This hunger strike ultimately forced the government to announce that Unit 1 of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant would be mothballed after safety checks and construction on Unit 2 would be halted.
